name: Removable Storage Device
description: This reporting module provides audit information on files acceded in the removable storage device. These reports can also be select to run at hourly, daily, weekly or monthly intervals.

reports.name: Attempting to access a file from an external device
reports.description: This report is based on a complete record of users are attempting to access a file on an external device.

reports.name: A new external device was recognized by the system.
reports.description: This report is based on a complete record of when the system recognized a new external device.

reports.name: File and folder deletions in the storage device
reports.description: This report is based complete record of all file and folder deletions in the storage device, along with details on who deleted what, when, and where.
